snippet.title: Mutation Gameplay video
snippet.description:
We present to you a short gameplay video of our game: Mutation.

Run for your life as a morphing horror hunts you through
procedural generated labyrinths. Look for the keys to escape and solve the
randomly-generated puzzles.
Gather experience by crafting items, slaying enemies, escaping or falling in
this fatal environment to improve your chances of surviving... but be ready, for the horror won't let you be the only one to evolve.
Search through the maddening facility to unfold the story, the characters' pasts and the world-building notes scattered all over the game, as you reach the truth.
